text: Tell you what Billy, when you can cleanly shoot someone running centre pack at the Boston Marathon from five blocks away, we can trade roles. In the meantime, shut up and swing your bat like a good little boy.

segments.text: Tell you what Billy, when you can cleanly shoot someone running centre pack at the Boston
Marathon from five blocks away, we can trade roles.
In the meantime, shut up and swing your bat like a good little boy.
